36#include "mech_locl.h"
37
38GSSAPI_LIB_FUNCTION OM_uint32 GSSAPI_LIB_CALL
39gss_encapsulate_token(gss_const_buffer_t input_token,
40 gss_const_OID oid,
41 gss_buffer_t output_token)
42{
43 GSSAPIContextToken ct;
44 int ret;
45 size_t size;
46
47 ret = der_get_oid (oid->elements, oid->length, &ct.thisMech, &size);
48 if (ret) {
49 _mg_buffer_zero(output_token);
50 return GSS_S_FAILURE;
51 }
52
53 ct.innerContextToken.data = input_token->value;
54 ct.innerContextToken.length = input_token->length;
55
56 ASN1_MALLOC_ENCODE(GSSAPIContextToken,
57 output_token->value, output_token->length,
58 &ct, &size, ret);
59 der_free_oid(&ct.thisMech);
60 if (ret) {
61 _mg_buffer_zero(output_token);
62 return GSS_S_FAILURE;
63 }
64 if (output_token->length != size)
65 abort();
66
67 return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
68}
69
